channel.title: Identify on Marlow's Listener
channel.description: Recent content in Identify on Marlow's Listener

item.title: The eternal "who"
item.description: We perceive the light reflected from ten million leaves and see the pattern trees. We perceive the air on our skin or the dinner in our gut and feel the pattern me. But me should be us, an ecosystem of bacteria and viruses to which we each are the primordial forest. Nor is industrial agriculture missing â€“ we suppress or enhance fertility, apply pesticides and fertilizers and sprinkle fairy dust into our brains.
